alert.note: Alert for Churchill (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 19 at 7:35PM PDT until July 19 at 8:30PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Central Churchill County in west central Nevada... * Until 830 PM PDT. * At 730 PM PDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 24 miles southeast of Lovelock to near Lahontan Reservoir, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * Highways impacted include...US 95 from mile marker 55 south to mile marker 8. Alt US 50 from Hazen to US 50. US 50 from Jct. of US 50 to mile marker 43. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Lahontan Reservoir, Hazen, Stillwater, Fallon Municipal Airport, Silver Hill, Fallon Station, Lone Rock, Healy Peak, Dixie Valley, Mount Lincoln, and Battleground Point. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be hazardous. Delay or reroute travel. Remain aware of the weather.
